home.title: Eco Vision
home.description: Global warming is a phenomenon involving the increase in average terrestrial temperatures. This has serious repercussions on our planet, causing glacier melting, sea-level rise, and extreme climate changes. It is essential to monitor and understand these data to take preventive measures.

co2.title: CO2 Levels
co2.description: Excess CO2 in the atmosphere is one of the main causes of climate change. This greenhouse gas traps heat in the atmosphere, leading to global temperature increases.
impacts: Extreme weather events like hurricanes and droughts
solutions: Limit CO2 emissions through environmental policies
Support carbon capture and storage technologies
